en.content: An immense weight pounds you to the stone floor. Your neck snaps even as your skull shatters.

text.content: You have been killed by a collapsing church roof! It was a bold but risky plan. Why not try the adventure again??

zh.content: 庞大的重量将你猛然拍到石地板上。你的脖子啪嚓一声折断，头颅也被压得粉碎。

text.content: 你被坍塌的教堂屋顶砸死了!这计划虽然大胆，但风险太大了。为何不重新尝试这次冒险呢?
